transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello sir, na Angrosh speaking from IndiaMART-le irunthu.

Customer: Sollunga.

Customer: Sir, anniki mail kettiruntheen, neenga sonningale indha maari na ungalukku share pandren, na enoda mail id details kooda ungalukku whatsapp-le anupchi irukken.

Customer: Na pandren sir, yennana adhellaam payment refund varadhukku chance illainnu sollitta solli irukraangala, appadiye vitturaangala, irukraangala, illa enga brother solli irundhaanga, yennana avanga kooda ippo IndiaMART use pandradhu illa.

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Na anupparen, free-ya irukkumbodhu anupparen. Neenga mail. Illa sir, na ungalukku support pandradhukkaaga thaan na try pandren. Ippo neenga vandhu solreenga ungalukku indha maari ellaam commitment koduthu irukkaangannu. So, adhukku neenga enna unga side-le irundhu oru idhu raise panna mudiyumo request neenga adhai yenakku pannunga.

Executive: As soon as possible neenga evvalavo na pona vaaram naama pesinadhu neenga mudinja alavukku appave neenga koduthu irundheenganna innneram na yen team-le idhai vandhu update panni iruppen.

Customer: Seri na anupparen.

Executive: Yes sir, na ungalukku already yennoda mail id koduthu irukken sir, neenga adhu-le share pannineenganna kooda na inga paathuppen.

Customer: Seri ok.

Executive: Ok, ungalukku enna solli irundhaanga, neenga vandhuttu edhunaale ippo vandhu indha maari oru complaint raise panni irukkeenga. So, plus vandhu ungalukku satisfaction illainna refund kodukkalaannu sonnaanga, adhaiyum neenga highlight panni podunga.

Customer: Seri ok.

Executive: Hmm, yenakku adhu konjam mail thareengale ippo?

Customer: Hmm, pandren.

Executive: Ok, ok sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is concerned about refund.

- Customer says commitment was given.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to share details via email.

- Executive assured to look into the matter.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send the details via email.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, email, commitment
